Name: Silva
Description: Silva was a top mixed martial artist of his time and a legend. He would soon however become bored and after not losing a single fight decided to retire and travel off into the mountains in search of something new. Thankfully for him he didnâ€™t have to search for very long as the founder was impressed at his prowess and ability therefore bringing him into his game and allowing him to experience a new challenge for the first time in a long time
